name: places/ChIJCx3ddpVYwokROleWJT7dvcI
formattedAddress: 521 Park Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 521 Park Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text:
When I had finally decided that I was going to get my nose surgery done, I had spent A LOT of time researching who I was going to go with. Dr. Liotta came up as one of the best in the field, so I made the call. From the initial experience with the person on the phone, I had a good feeling.

The next step was meeting with Dr. Liotta for a consultation and she made me feel so comfortable right from the start. While she was extremely professional, I felt like I was talking with someone who genuinely cared and listened to me throughout the meeting. She answered all of my questions, assured me with all of her answers, and I truly felt like I was in good hands going forward.

The day of the surgery came and I was surprisingly not nervous at all. Dr. Liotta and every one of her staff that I worked with going into the operating room made me feel like their sole purpose was to take good care of me and ensure that everything was working according to plan.

Dr. Liotta was easily available throughout the post-op all the way up until the day I had the cast removed. She was there to ask me how I was recovering and answered all of my questions. I truly could not have asked for a better experience than the one I had with Dr. Liotta and her team.

originalText.text: Dr Liotta is a very nice good doctor if you have thing skin this is the doctor you go to my now husband and I did both nose surgery’s same time , his was more for breathing and she fixed his nose tip and looks amazing my nose in the other hand was a different case my skin is thick and I wanted my tip more defined , thinner which didn’t happened the very same day of the surgery when I was about to go she said to me cause of my thick skin  my nose was not going to have the result I wanted just right before we went in and I did it anyway was my first surgery I was a nervous wreck I wish I didn’t cause I didn’t get the result I wanted you can tell I barely did something after 20k !! It’s been 2 years has hoping  my nose got better is the same !!  now have to do it again and fix my problem I wish I knew she couldn’t do my nose the way I wanted  2 days , a day before so I could make a different decision .

originalText.text: I cannot speak highly enough about Dr. Liotta and her office/practice. From initial consult to now 15 days post surgery I have been genuinely impressed and Dr. Liotta and her staff have far exceeded my expectations (which were high to begin with). Dr. Liotta and her staff have been informative, extremely attentive, honest, warm and so kind which were and are all the things I needed as that I am anxiety and worry prone to begin with . As mentioned above I am now 15 days post op and I am already so happy with my initial results that words cannot even describe. It is so important to do your due diligence in research before any surgery and I totally understand how difficult and especially stressful that aspect of this process is and if any reviews can assist in that research process I hope that my review can reach someone out there and confirm a strong recommendation for Dr. Liotta and her office/practice.

originalText.text: Dr. Liotta is amazing. I loved every minute with her. She is knowledgeable and sensitive and very informative. Her bedside manner is incredible and you immediately know you are in good and capable hands. I strongly recommend her! The office is beautiful and quiet. Her staff is super helpful and friendly. I already look forward to my next appointment. It was a delightful experience

originalText.text: Dr. Liotta treated me on two separate occasions: once with a removal of a benign tumor on my face, and once for stitches from a dog bite. She handled each procedure delicately, with, thoughtful incision placement, and wonderful follow up, and I have no scarring! I’m very grateful to have found Dr. Liotta.
